result.title: 字符串比较
result.content:
http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/724/A 字符串比较是否相等 string用== char用strcmp 相等为0 不等为1

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char s[7][15]={"monday","tuesday","wednesday","thursday","friday","saturday","sunday"};
int main()
{
    char a[2][15];
    int b[2];
    int i,j;
    cin>>a[0];
    cin>>a[1];
    for(j=0;j<2;j++)
    for(i=0;i<7;i++){
        if(!strcmp(a[j],s[i])){
            b[j]=i+1;
        }
    }


    if(b[0]==b[1]||(b[0]+2)%7==b[1]%7||(b[0]+3)%7==b[1]%7)
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    else
        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
    return 0;
}
